     & hf0_fuel(mfuel), dh_fuel_t0_zero0, dh_fuel_t0_zero(mfuel), &

     & Tref_fuel30, Tref_fuel3(mfuel), cp_fuel_exp0, &
     & cp_fuel_exp(mfuel, mcp), cp_fuel_const0, cp_fuel_const(mfuel, mcp), &
     & h1_fuel_const0, h1_fuel_const(mfuel), s1_fuel_const0, &
     & s1_fuel_const0(mfuel)
